profile.name: Profile Name
profile.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this profile?

chat.title: Chat with Documents
chat.llmContextLengthInfo: Maximum context length for the local LLM model. Higher values use more memory.
chat.openaiInfo: Uses OpenAI API for chat. Requires API key.
chat.localInfo: Uses local Qwen3 model. Free, downloaded on first use.
chat.apiKeySameInfo: Same key used for embeddings can be used here.
chat.modelInfo: Enter the OpenAI model to use for chat.
chat.welcomeDescription: Ask questions about your synced documents. The AI will search and reference them automatically.
chat.inputPlaceholder: Ask a question about your documents...
chat.apiKeyRequired: Please enter an OpenAI API key for chat.

map.title: Knowledge Map
map.quickSearchInfo: Visualize the semantic neighborhood around your top results.
map.statusNoCoords: No map data yet · finish a sync to generate it
map.previewHint: Select a node to preview its chunk.
map.serverError: Unable to start the map server.
map.infoBody:
Dots represent document chunks.
Bright dots are your top 5 results.
Nearby dots are semantic neighbors.
Faint dots are the broader map.
Lines connect adjacent chunks from the same document.

ui.apiKeyRequired: API key required for OpenAI embeddings
ui.embeddingContextLengthInfo: Maximum context length for local embedding model. Higher values allow longer texts but use more memory. Default: 8192
ui.llmContextLengthInfo: Maximum context length for local LLM model. Higher values allow longer conversations but use more memory. Default: 8192
ui.localEmbeddingInfo: Local model runs offline, downloaded on first use
ui.qwen3Description: 1024 dimensions • High quality • Runs locally via llama.cpp
ui.openaiDescription: 3072 dimensions • Requires API key • Best quality
ui.embeddingProviderChangeWarning:
Changing the embedding provider requires deleting the database and re-syncing all files. The embedding dimensions are different between providers.

Do you want to continue?
ui.syncWillBeStopped: Note: The current sync will be stopped.
ui.cannotDeleteLastProfile: Cannot delete the last profile. Please create another profile first.
ui.deleteProfileConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this profile?
ui.cannotChangePortWhileRunning: Cannot change port while server is running. Please stop the server first.
ui.noFilesInDatabase:
No files in database yet.
Start syncing a folder to add files.
ui.noChunksFound: No chunks found for this file.
ui.driveFolderPlaceholder: Paste Google Drive folder link or ID
ui.driveFolderHelp: Choose a Drive folder to index. Only one source per profile.
